short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This should help make Tangerine's new website looks a little bit less ugly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes several changes to the new Tangerine website to hide some useless information and reorder some elements. Source are available on github.
